text: my name is riyaz rahan I'm from Alida a
world's leading CX company I'm the
president of products and Engineering
AWS helps us in many ways the first is
allowing us to be nimble and agile and
bring software to our customers quickly
the second is to really manage our cost
effectively because we can scale up and
scale down very quickly based on what
our customers want and finally AWS is
really our Innovation engine AWS
constantly brings new capabilities new
models new databases a new functionality
into its repertoire and my company
leverages all of that to really make our
customers happy one of the biggest
Trends I see is the speed of software
delivery so expectations from customers
have changed dramatically since the
pandemic and customers expect a lot more
software being delivered by vendors much
faster and also much closer to their
expectations AWS helps my company Drive
Innovation and drive tangible results
for my customers
